pr_title: Implement Analytics events for PLS work

timeline.message:
Implement Analytics events for PLS work
- LEARNER-8001
- Added 3 events as follow:
  - PLS Banner Viewed
  - PLS Shift Button Tapped
  - PLS Shift Dates

Implement Analytics events for PLS work
- LEARNER-8001
- Added 3 events as follow:
  - PLS Banner Viewed
  - PLS Shift Button Tapped
  - PLS Shift Dates

timeline.bodyText: IMO Track the PLS Course Dates Banner appearance is more suitable here.
timeline.author: farhan-arshad-dev
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -434,6 +434,39 @@ void trackBulkDownloadSwitchOn(@NonNull String courseId, int totalDownloadableVi
     void trackCastDeviceConnectionChanged(@NonNull String eventName, @NonNull String connectionState,
                                           @NonNull String playMedium);
 
+    /**
+     * Track the PLS Course Dates Banner

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/OpenEdXMobile/src/main/java/org/edx/mobile/module/analytics/Analytics.java b/OpenEdXMobile/src/main/java/org/edx/mobile/module/analytics/Analytics.java
index dd6320d1..6084ad57 100644
--- a/OpenEdXMobile/src/main/java/org/edx/mobile/module/analytics/Analytics.java
+++ b/OpenEdXMobile/src/main/java/org/edx/mobile/module/analytics/Analytics.java

@@ -435,37 +435,37 @@ public interface Analytics {
                                           @NonNull String playMedium);
 
     /**
-     * Track the PLS Course Dates Banner
+     * Track the PLS Course Dates Banner appearance
      *
-     * @param biValue    biValue of course date banner type
-     * @param courseId   course id of the course we are viewing
-     * @param courseMode course mode of the course we are viewing
-     * @param screenName The screen name to track
-     * @param bannerType Type of course date banner
+     * @param biValue        biValue of course date banner type
+     * @param courseId       course id of the course where banner appears
+     * @param enrollmentMode enrollment mode of the course where banner appears
+     * @param screenName     The screen name where banner appears
+     * @param bannerType     Type of course date banner
      */
-    void trackPLSCourseDatesBanner(@NonNull String biValue, @NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String courseMode,
+    void trackPLSCourseDatesBanner(@NonNull String biValue, @NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String enrollmentMode,
                                    @NonNull String screenName, @NonNull String bannerType);
 
     /**
-     * Track the PLS Course Dates Shift Dates Button Tapped
+     * Track the Shift Dates button tapped on PLS Course Dates Banner
      *
-     * @param courseId   course id of the course we are viewing
-     * @param courseMode course mode of the course we are viewing
-     * @param screenName The screen name to track
+     * @param courseId       course id of the course where banner appears
+     * @param enrollmentMode enrollment mode of the course where button will be tapped
+     * @param screenName     The screen name on which button will be tapped
      */
-    void trackPLSCourseDatesShiftButtonTapped(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String courseMode,
-                                              @NonNull String screenName);
+    void trackPLSShiftButtonTapped(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String enrollmentMode,
+                                   @NonNull String screenName);
 
     /**
-     * Track the PLS Course Dates Shift response
+     * Track that PLS Course Dates Shifted successfully or not
      *
-     * @param courseId   course id of the course we are viewing
-     * @param courseMode course mode of the course we are viewing
-     * @param screenName The screen name to track
-     * @param isSuccess  Does the shifted successful or not
+     * @param courseId       course id of the course where banner appears
+     * @param enrollmentMode enrollment mode of the course on which dates will be shifted
+     * @param screenName     The screen name on which dates will be shifted
+     * @param isSuccess      Does the shifted successful or not
      */
-    void trackPLSCourseDatesShift(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String courseMode,
-                                  @NonNull String screenName, @NonNull boolean isSuccess);
+    void trackPLSCourseDatesShift(@NonNull String courseId, @NonNull String enrollmentMode,
+                                  @NonNull String screenName, boolean isSuccess);
 
     interface Keys {
         String NAME = "name";

timeline.message:
Implement Analytics events for PLS work
- LEARNER-8001
- Added 3 events as follow:
  - PLS Banner Viewed
  - PLS Shift Button Tapped
  - PLS Shift Dates
- Refactor CourseDateBannerInfo API Call

  - PLS Banner Viewed
  - PLS Shift Button Tapped
  - PLS Shift Dates
- Refactor CourseDateBannerInfo API Call
